Mohamed Fouad Shafiq, onye a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Fouad Shafik ma ọ bụ Fouad Chafik (1899-1964) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ Shafiq "Mohamed Fouad Shafiq" na 13 Ọktoba 1899, na Cairo, Egypt
Nna ya bụ onye Egypt sitere na Turkey nke ezinụlọ ya si na Crete bịa Egypt; nwanne ya nwoke bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama Hussein Riad
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị, Shafiq hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya wee kwaga Sudan ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ma lụọ di.
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Egypt n'afọ 1924, Shafiq zutere Youssef Wahbi wee malite ọrụ ya n'ime ihe nkiri "Anthem of Hope"
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu na Fatima Rushdi Ensemble
Egwuregwu ya dịgasị iche n'etiti ihe ọchị na ọdachi.
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị  2 ọnwa Septemba afọ 1964.
